summary: 该接口可以清理之前复制组从盘启动的容灾演练，并尝试删除自动创建出来的演练盘。

schema.title: 地域ID。
schema.description: 地域ID。您可以调用[DescribeRegions](~~354276~~)查询异步复制功能支持的地域信息。

schema.title: 复制组ID。
schema.description: 复制组ID。您可以通过[DescribeDiskReplicaGroups](~~426614~~)接口查询异步复制组列表，获得复制组ID。

schema.title: 演练ID。
schema.description: 演练ID。您可以通过[DescribeReplicaGroupDrills](~~2584481~~)接口查询当前地域下复制对的容灾演练。

400.errorMessage: The specified parameter %s and %s are not blank at the same time.
Specified parameter format is not valid.
The input parameter %s that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied.

403.errorMessage: User is not authorized to operate.
User is not authorized to operate this action.
Your account does not have enough balance.
The last token request is processing.
The RAM user does not have the permission to create service linked role: AliyunServiceLinkedRoleForEBS.

404.errorMessage: Specified api is not found, please check your url and method.
The specified resource does not exist.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure.

504.errorMessage: The request is timeout, please try again later.

title: 清理异步复制组的容灾演练
